passages.text:
You awake in a dark, gloomy basement with only one small window and a staircase.

[[Look Around->Room]]
[[Close your eyes.]]
passages.name: The Basement

passages.text:
You see nothing. You gain nothing.

[[Open your eyes.->Room]]
passages.name: Close your eyes.

passages.text:
What will you do with the hammer?

[[Break the window.]]
[[Break the door at the top of the stairs.]]
[[Set it down.->Room]]

links.name: Break the door at the top of the stairs.
links.link: Break the door at the top of the stairs.

passages.name: Take the hammer.

passages.text:
What will you do with the blanket?

[[Wear it.]]
[[Set it down.->Room]]
passages.name: Take the blanket.

passages.text:
You see some old rusty nails, a blanket, and a hammer.

[[Take the hammer.]]
[[Take the blanket.]]
[[Take the nails.->Take the nails.]]
passages.name: Room

passages.text:
You beat the hammer on the window, and after a moment, the glass shatters.

[[Crawl out of the window.]]
[[Try the door instead.->Break the door at the top of the stairs.]]

links.name: Try the door instead.
links.link: Break the door at the top of the stairs.

passages.name: Break the window.

passages.text:
You beat the hammer on the doorknob, and it breaks off.

[[Push the door open.]]
[[Go back downstairs.->Take the hammer.]]
passages.name: Break the door at the top of the stairs.

passages.text:
You're warmer, but still trapped in this basement. What now?

[[Take the hammer.]] 
[[Take the nails.]]
passages.name: Wear it.

passages.text:
You pound the nails on the glass of the window, but they're too dull.

[[Hmm, maybe this wont work.->Take the nails.]]
passages.name: Doesn't work

passages.text:
You pick the nails at the doorknob, but it doesn't budge.

[[Hmm, maybe this wont work.->Take the nails.]]
passages.name: Doesn't work2

passages.text:
You push open the door, and for a moment, all you see is black.

[[Blink.->The Basement]]
passages.name: Push the door open.

passages.text:
What will you do with the nails?

[[Break the window.->Doesn't work]]
[[Break the door at the top of the stairs.->Doesn't work2]]
[[Set them down.->Room]]

links.name: Break the door at the top of the stairs.

passages.name: Take the nails.

passages.text:
Carefully, you crawl out of the window, leaving the hammer behind as you do. As you walk, you find yourself free from the basement.

[[Start over->The Basement]]
passages.name: Crawl out of the window.
